dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 10.15468/dl.jfjvhv
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Kazakhstan", "TaxonKey is Turdus pilaris Linnaeus, 1758" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 6 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 17 records from Birds and Mammals Collections of the Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University 9 records from RU-BIRDS.RU, Birds observations database from Russia and neighboring regions. Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University. 1 records from Vertebrates Collection of the Karaganda Buketov University Museum of Nature 223 records from EOD â€“ eBird Observation Dataset 41 records from Hatikka.fi observations 4 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 65 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
